description: A mission to patrol the perimeter of the specified geo json area, searching for other drones at an altitude of 75 meters.

waypoints.description: Take off from the central point
Navigate to the southwest corner of the area
Patrol the southern boundary of the area
Patrol the eastern boundary of the area
Patrol the northern boundary of the area
Patrol the western boundary of the area
Land back at the central point

safety_considerations: Avoid flying over densely populated areas
Maintain a safe distance from other drones
Be aware of any changes in weather conditions
success_criteria: Successfully patrol the entire perimeter of the area
Identify any other drones in the area
Return to the central point without any damage
original_command: haz un recorrido del area perimetro del geo json buscando drones a una altura de 75 metros
